channel.title: React.js on Joan Perals — UX Developer
channel.description: Recent content in React.js on Joan Perals — UX Developer

item.description: As a startup incubator, Next Big Thing brought me the chance to get involved in a variety of innovative projects across the whole development cycle —from prototyping to production.
In 2020 I joined Amazon, where I contributed to the launch of the AWS Systems Manager Quick Setup console. Since 2022 I am part of the team behind Cloudscape, the AWS design system.
